WorkItem.Description: Do we have any documents for uploading catalogs and manage servers drivers and firmwares through wpp.
WorkItem.Summary: servers driver and firmware updates through WPP

Comments.Message:
Yes, sure. In the zip file that you have downloaded from CodePlex, you will find two PDF file :
- Importing Updates from Vendor's Catalog.pdf
- Catalogs' subscriptions management.pdf

And if Google translate is sufficent 

http://translate.google.de/translate?sl=de&tl=en&js=n&prev=_t&hl=de&ie=UTF-8&u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.wsus.de%2Fveroeffentlichen_von_hardwareupdates_mit_hilfe_von_wsus_package_publisher

Regards
Norbert
